Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel! Excellent Staff that speaks good English!”
Reviews.Author: Andz L
Reviews.Content: We stayed here last week, me and my family really enjoyed our stay. The staff treated us really well and they speak really good English so you wouldn't have to look up translation etc to speak with the staff. When we got to the hotel, we were welcomed by Ruby from the reception and we were offered if we wanted to go to the bar (met barman Shukri who was really nice to us) and we got to our room really quick and easy. They also offer wi-fi which was essential for me. First of all, the location. People are looking for a hotel which is not far from the center. This hotel is right next to the center, 15mins max walk to the colosseum and the termini station is only 2 mins walk. From Termini station, you can get the metro to different tourist attraction locations really easy for only €1 (even to the Vatican City). Also, we got the train from the Fiumicino airport to Termini station which only took 32mins. Next is the rooms in the hotel. Our room was really great and spacious. We had an executive room which had a table, 2 chairs and a sofa. And don't forget the beds of course. There was a fridge and a safe to put your luxurious things. The only thing I did not like was the glass doors to the toilet. You might not be able to see the person inside perfectly, but you can still see the figure of someone sitting on the toilet or having a shower. The breakfast was great in the morning. A lot of selection, from freshly baked bread to cold cuts and don't forget the cakes. Joyce offered to make us cappuccino and if we wanted other drinks. You can fill yourself up ready to go to your destination nice and early. Overall, really great hotel to stay in. If you ask the staff, they will point you to the right direction and give you the best advice.

Reviews.Title: “my last stay in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Truedreamer
Reviews.Content: I spent just one night in Ariston Hotel in April 2012 for a business trip. Arriving late, I needed an hotel close to the Termini Train Station in order to move easier the following day using the metro. So I opted for this Hotel, very easy to reach on foot by the Train station. This area is not elegant but it is quiet and decent. The hotel is modern and clean, with good beds and a nice bathroom. I had a twin room. There are TV and complimentary coffee available in the room. The self service breakfast, included in the room rate, was good, nothing special, but enough to start the day with energies, even if i missed my cappuccino, because here they serve only coffee made with an automatic machine. Service was efficient and warm. It is not easy to find parking around.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel but service need to be improved”
Reviews.Author: MarcoS333
Reviews.Content: Stayed here last year in October with my partner for a few days.The location is ideal, close to Termini Station and the Vatican is not so far etc.Rooms are modern didn´t have to wait long to check in,breakfast was ok,nothing special. Overall we were very satisfied with everything however the reception staff should be more polite with the customers.Would visit again!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel one block from Termini Station”
Reviews.Author: fjchorroc
Reviews.Content: Wonderful boutique hotel with all the amenities you would expect from higher priced hotels in the same area. Wonderful breakfast included with your room. Location could not be better for getting around the city and connecting to the train station for travel in Italy.

Reviews.Title: “Not so Fantastico!”
Reviews.Author: Graham S Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Some of our group had great rooms, others cetainly did not. The booking process is a shambles and there were not the rooms available which we had booked 6 months earlier to ensure availability. notwithstanding that, and having to queue behind a long line of people complaining, the reception staff were doing their best and were plesant at all times. The location is great, as being close to Termini meant a short taxi ride anywhere in Rome. however the district is quite sketchy. It served our purposes as a large group watching the rugby, but when we return in 2 years we'll be looking at other alternatives.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel near Termini station”
Reviews.Author: Shannon H
Reviews.Content: Professional reception staff, spoke english very well. Had to remind them of our booking package (free wifi and champagne).Arrived at 5am due to ferry delay so missed a night and they had not tried to contact us. Modern rooms, facilities clean. Wifi great. Breakfast excellent... big selection, fresh and beautifully presented. Nice to unwind with Happy Hour with complimentary food but bar prices expensive. Restaurants nearby fantastic.

Reviews.Title: “I loved it! Very good. Would recommend it.”
Reviews.Author: Ilse B Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Location is very good. Near trainstation en both metro-lines. Nice staff, good service. Breakfast was also good. And our room was very big en clean with great beds. Also we really likes the big shower!

Reviews.Title: “perfect!!!”
Reviews.Author: stauros s
Reviews.Content: The experience in the Hotel Ariston in Rome is indeed something unforgettable for the traveler. The friendliness of the people in the reception and their will to help you with whatever needed during your stay there is the first thing to commend on. The rooms are very beautiful and remarkably clean. The towels, sheets and bathroom supplies are changed daily, giving you a pleasant refreshing feeling every time you return back to the hotel leaving behind the intense and overwhelming Italian capital. While at the same time the rich and tasteful breakfast gives you all the energy you need every morning to continue exploring and enjoying the Eternal City.

Reviews.Title: “Fell short of our expectation.”
Reviews.Author: First time Trav... . Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Though very near the Train Station, we were rather disappointed with : 1. Bathroom Drainage was so poor that shower water could not be drained fast enough, resulting in over-flowing into the bedroom ! 2. Noisy fromk tarffic from street below -- could not have a quiet-night's sleep; 3. Had to make repeated requests for a small water boiler to be provided ; 4. Room for two is just too Squeezy .. hardly any room to move at all.. This should not have been classified as a 4-star hotel...for the totol cost of Euro 498 we paid for 5 night stay . We did receive breakfast at 10 Euro per person against the normal cots of 15. NOTE - kindly do not display my/our names -- just " first time Traveller from Melbourne" will do -thanks.

Reviews.Title: “Too small rooms for a hotel with so many stars”
Reviews.Author: EJ B Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: We had reserved 2 rooms, with the St Valentine's offer, included breakfast and a bottle of wine. At first they didn't know it were 2 rooms, but after waiting a quarter we got the rooms. One of them was so terrible, it was too small and too hot, the airconditioning didn't work at all. We had complained, and they offered us for de last night a good room. A room you may expect by a hotel with so many stars. Our childeren slept 2 nights in a hotelroom which was terrible. About the bottles of wine ...... we didn't see them.

Reviews.Title: “Very close to Termini Station - Excellent for one night”
Reviews.Author: Marcelo R
Reviews.Content: Ariston is an independent hotel. We arrived very late night to airport, took train to Termini station an lost our HiSpeed train to Venice, so we had to sleep somewhere that night as our next train was departing next day at 07:00 am. When we got out walking from Termini with our 2 large siutcases, we saw a lot of not very friendly faces ... we ask police for orientation and recommend us to go walk two blocks from there where there were several hotels to select from. When we entered the street, we entered the first hotel we saw, and that was the Ariston. The triple room was very nice, clean and modern, with 2 rooms. Breakfast was included but didn´t have time because of our erly departure. The hotel seems to be great, but it is too close to a non very friendly neighborhood. I would recommend this hotel for a short stay.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal”
Reviews.Author: Domnanas
Reviews.Content: This Rome hotel is situated very near to the Termini railway station, just 5 minutes walk. This hotel has all the visitor's needs in this beautiful city, the underground is in the railway station itself and one can arrive in a few minutes to most of the important sites. The staff are very helpful, the rooms are cosy and very clean, breakfast is typically what one finds in a 4 star hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great find in Rome”
Reviews.Author: JohnbGrimsby_UK
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with three friends and what a surprise. Very close to the station (termini), and if you're reasonably fit you can walk to all the attractions. Hotel was very clean and tidy, staff friendly and helpful, and the room was spotlessly clean. A large variety for breakfast helped us through the day and there are some great little trattorias close by. We will be back and the Ariston will be our first choice.

Reviews.Title: “worst experience ever”
Reviews.Author: Lefteris G
Reviews.Content: stay there just for a night cause we got bitten by insects and had to live at 3 oclock at night without even apologising to us even people from booking.com when we told them our story contact them and they said that they would apologise for our hassle they didnt do a thing so if you ever go there check out your room first

Reviews.Title: “Good location, poor accomodation”
Reviews.Author: dizzydavew
Reviews.Content: The hotel was centrally located, rooms were of reasonable size. Decoration was individually styled, not sure who to but im sure that someone thought it was good. Rooms were functional but not really that clean. Budget hotel and you get what you pay for. Would not recommend but at the same time its ok for a couple of nights.

Reviews.Title: “Ok place”
Reviews.Author: Betsy98
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 3 nights here,clean but very small room;it was our first time in Rome but guessing the sizes were fairly the same as any European rooms. Breakfast was ok.But there are lots of places to eat anyway as near the Termini station (about 2 mins) so it was never a problem. the hotel is also near the bus stations, we used the hop-on hop-off bus during our stay and we could always go back to the hotel for a quick shower at noon ( it was a very hot summer) then hop on the bus again for the rest of the afternoon sightseeing. The place seemed safe to stay despite it being near the Termini station. This hotel is good if you stay for a few days and you want a clean and safe place to stay.Also it helps if you only have a small luggage, as not much space in the room.

Reviews.Title: “last time”
Reviews.Author: Pawel_EPWR
Reviews.Content: Location is close to train station, within walking distance. The staff was very helpfull and freindly. Very small room, tiny bathroom and shower. There are tea making facilites in the bedrooms. The breakfast was below average and the price was very high. The air conditioning did not work. I won’t come back.

Reviews.Title: “Recommended for Budget travellers”
Reviews.Author: Amy_666
Reviews.Content: A small hotel with excellent location, 2 mins from Termini station. Lots of good close by restaurants (walking distance). Rooms are extremely small and you barely have space for 1 suit case, the view was terrible... On the other hand buffet breakfast has a wide variety of delicious items all types of pastries, cold cuts, cheeses etc. veery good :) I recommend the hotel for budget travellers, especially in terms of distance you will find everything absolutely close. Benefit from the street vendors that are 2 mins away from the hotel selling bags, clothes, shoes etc..

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel near Termini”
Reviews.Author: aliveinlogan
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed 2 weeks in Rome at the Ariston. It was ideal for getting around Rome for the first time. It is only one block from the Termini station where you can catch a train to other locations. The bus station is right next to that. We spent several days on the Amalfi Coast and the high speed train to Naples was great. We ate breakfast at the Ariston each morning before headding out to see Rome. The breakfast was very good and filling. The rooms we stayed in were a euro-modern, comfortable and clean. It had a safe in the room so you could safely store passports and computers. There are many restaurants, shops, banks, in the area. There are several sights in this area like Basilica St Majore, and The National Roman Museums. We walked to the collusium and forum. Other sights were very accessible by bus. At night we would return from a long day of sightseeing and stop in the hotel bar and have a few drinks. The bar has good appetizers and some nights this was enough to fill us up before going to sleep. We really enjoyed our stay in Rome and I think it would not have been as enjoyable if we didn't have such nice place to call home. I will stay at the Ariston next trip.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: solmolly1
Reviews.Content: ideal location, front desk staff was helpfull and the breakfast was excellent. The renovations vastly improved the rooms and has given the hotel ariston a more modern look and feel throughout. At the check in gave me an upgrade and made sure our room was ready. Great job and great hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location - good value for money”
Reviews.Author: V S
Reviews.Content: Great value for the money - and location couldn't be better - SO close to Termini Station and walking distance to all major sites. We stayed here for 6 nights in July 2011. Bathroom shower looked like it had not been cleaned in a long time, and unsure about how often our room was cleaned. Reception was wonderful! Very helpful and knowledgeable. Breakfast buffet was included in our hotel price - typical items: scrambled eggs, toast, french toast, cereals, sweets/desserts, sausages, etc.... worth eating at the hotel to save money and have more to spend later in the day! Very close to a few excellent restaurants - did not go to the bar or the restaurant at the back of the hotel for dinner.

Reviews.Title: “Good location - but 4 Star?”
Reviews.Author: OkiriosAlan
Reviews.Content: Booked via lastminute.com and categorised 4 Star. Very convenient for the Termini main station, for arrival and departure, and for the Metro for visiting the Colosseum, the Vatican, etc. Smallish room with small window opening onto a dark fire escape. Curtains would not open all the way. MFI type fitted wardrobe. Free safe. Coffee making facilities. Large, comfortable double bed. Good shower but shower room had large crack in window and some skirting trim missing. Cleaning regular and apparently efficient but champagne cork under edge of bed for 2 days. (I know - I should have put it in the bin myself.) Drinks at the bar are expensive, as in many places in Rome, and we had to ask for the price list: coke £4.50 and beer £7. Bar staff were reluctant to allow us to pay cash for drinks and wanted us to put them on our room bills. The barman had to go to the reception desk to get change for us each time we paid. 7/10 for accuracy here, though all ok in the end. We took advantage of the 'happy hour' when we arrived; this amounts to free bruschetta and nibbles at the bar with drinks the same price. We don't visit Rome very often so we thought we'd do the same thing again the next night, Sunday. Unfortunately, despite the permanent 'happy hour' sign this only applies to Fridays and Saturdays. So I altered their sign for them so other guests werent confused. Breakfast was very good: in pleasant surroundings with a good range of high quality buffet items. Catering staff were efficient and polite. The girls on reception were extremely helpful and polite. When we needed help and advice this was given accurately, efficiently and sympathetically, with no condescending or arrogant advice. So if you need help, make sure you ask the girls, especially if you need access to an english speaking doctor to prescribe painkillers and antibiotics for a young person's chest/throat/ear infection. They got us a doctor in double quick time and sorted the problem. Great service. However, in circumstances similar to these, if you are advised by anyone else there that you should go to a&e and sit for 3 hours among the injured, badly injured and the dying in a hospital where they use office chairs instead of wheelchairs and where, when you complain that after 3 hours no-one has even taken your name, they say 'I joke at you' , ignore them.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: willj65
Reviews.Content: my wife and i stayed at the hotel ariston for four nights, the hotel was clean, the staff were very pleasant and helpful, our room was cleaned evey day. The hotel was a lot of better than i had originally anticipated given the price we paid. This hotel is great value for money and only 1 minute walk from the train station.

Reviews.Title: “good hotel”
Reviews.Author: sokisoki
Reviews.Content: excellent ubication. Staff speak english, french and spanish and french good enough and they are very friendly. The rooms are comfortable and very clean. Good hotel.

Reviews.Title: “cute and nice”
Reviews.Author: jayabram
Reviews.Content: this hotel is so cute and nice and hotel staff are very friendly and kind. The breakfast and happy hour are also nice. Great interior design. Very good location.

Reviews.Title: “Business trip”
Reviews.Author: sarabailey80
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 3 days on my recent business trip. Very good location. Good facilities for business traveler. The staff was particulary helpul in assisting with airport transfer and rome information. Breakfast was good present and delicious. The beds were comfortable. Towels were always replaced promptly and the room cleaned well. Would highhly recommend to any traveler.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel”
Reviews.Author: sandyad
Reviews.Content: The design of the hotel is modern and trendy. All the actual hotel staff were helpful in every way. Nice room and well designed. It was my second stay at hotel ariston and the experience was as posotive as the first time.

Reviews.Title: “Good and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: rosejenn
Reviews.Content: Ariston rome hotel was comfortable, clean and located in the city centre. Metro station was near as well as city terminal. It was also possible to walk to the eternals attractions. The breakfast was delicious. It offered lot of choise for heavy or minor demand. Everything was fine.

Reviews.Title: “Close to train station”
Reviews.Author: webbsm
Reviews.Content: This hotel is super close to the train station but is a bit of a walk to attractions. It has the world's smallest shower and perhaps the hardest bed. Still good value for the money and highly recommend if u need to be close to the station. Would stay again

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful stay”
Reviews.Author: vickyvichy
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located very well. Breakfast is good, it included eggs, ham, crissants, cheese, brad, fruits, cereal....! Service personell is good. Room comfortable and clean. Great value for money in such a central location.

Reviews.Title: “Nyce stay”
Reviews.Author: lisalee75
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed this hotel which found ideally located for ease of travel around rome, being a 1 minute walk from the metro and bus statiom. Our room was clean and comfortable.the breakfast was very good. The staff were very helpful and gave good service. We would stay here again if returning to rome!

Reviews.Title: “Hotel ariston. ..... amazing”
Reviews.Author: marioncud
Reviews.Content: Excellent location, breakfast is very good, Staff at the hotel is fantastic, multiligual ... helpful, friendly and welcoming! The room was big, clean, renovated, modern and comfortable! The. Bar is great and good happy hour. The perfect place to begin your stay in rome! Yoy can also reserved tours in rome directly at the reception.

Reviews.Title: “Booked Across the Street @ H. Morgana, They Brought Us Here...”
Reviews.Author: lamericanina
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for just one night while meeting up with friends who were passing through Rome, and I'm glad that I didn't stay any longer. I actually booked at the Hotel Morgana across the street, but when we walked into the reception there were several large tourist groups waiting to check in, and they walked us over to the Ariston instead. They're definitely going for a trendy-minimalist decor, but it really just comes off as cheap and shabby. The reception area is nice enough, and the breakfast was decent (although they had bad American pop music absolutely BLASTING at 8 am -- way too early for Jordan Bieber), but the double room we had was barely bigger than the bed itself. The bathroom was equally tiny, and the door to our room did not lock very securely. The hallways and stairwells were extremely narrow and run down -- it seemed as though they had squeezed every inch of space out of the floor plan to fit in more "rooms," and I hate to think what might happen if the fire alarm was to go off! Overall, our stay was fine, and they were kind enough to keep our luggage for us during the day until we left Rome, but it's this kind of experience that is a lesson in booking sooner rather than later during high tourist seasons.

Reviews.Title: “At best a good transit hotel – 4 star, definitely not”
Reviews.Author: Buddhakkan
Reviews.Content: This hotel is almost next door to the Termini station. At first glance quite smart, not run down like the other hotels in the neighbourhood. Rooms are of decent size and the breakfast is good VFM, but the positives sort of end here. The neighbourhood is dotted by cheap Chinese stores, dubious looking people. Though the beds are clean, the rooms have really shabby carpets and curtains and finally the staffs were quite rude. But then that might be a factor that we are brown skinned and we got similar treatment from most Italian cities this time. I have been to Rome a couple of times and I sincerely feel staying close to termini is not the best place to stay. Look at options at Via Nazionale, Via Veneto or Via Del Corso. However, if you do need to stay at an expensive hotel near termini you can consider Ariston.

Reviews.Title: “Rome Holiday November 2011”
Reviews.Author: Rolands G
Reviews.Content: The location is beside Termini train station and metro lines. Room was smaller than anticipated. Shower drainage was poor (onto bathroom floor). Very expensive for what you got. Breakfast coffee was not ok.

Reviews.Title: “Roman Holiday October 2011”
Reviews.Author: Shicks11
Reviews.Content: The Ariston's interior is smart, bordering on boutique chic in the public areas. Exterior of the building is rather shabby as befits the whole of the area around Termini. Breakfasts are possibly the best in Rome. Plenty of choice and selection. Likewise the bar buffet meal in the evenings is great value at 10 euros per person. The Gym on the 6th floor is pretty good too and spotlessly clean. Staff are polite and helpful in general. The rooms are large, clean and again are smartly decorated with modern furnishings however as per previous reviews the same problems persist as follows. Shower doors did not meet and so water leaked on to the bathroom floor. Additionally seal on the shower doors was hanging off. Mould was present around the frame and base of the shower tray. TV remote control was broken and held together with ageing sellotape. Beds were hard and uncomfortable as were the pillows. Views from both aspects of our rooms were horrible, looking out into a grim courtyard surrounded on two sides by the balconies of equally grim blocks of flats whose balconies were festooned with washing and fridges. Location in Termini is good logistically for getting around the city however the entire area is pretty run down and shabby looking and is frequented by dodgy characters and prostitutes on the street immediately outside the hotel front door however this is outside the hotel's control and so should not be classed as a critisism of the hotel itself.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Youngfamily004
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel with my husband and two young daughters (6 & 8). We were in a quadruple room on the 4th floor. The room itself was of a good size, very clean and the beds were comfortable. Only two negative points about the room, (1) the view from the window was rubbish. It looked out to the back of the hotel and our view was of brick walls! However, the advantage was it was very quiet. (2) The shower tray was very tired and looked dirty. The hotel staff were very friendly, efficient and happy to help. They were very good at giving directions and recommending places. Beware the 'Happy Hour' which is between 5pm and 8pm in the hotel bar. There is a really nice free buffet when you buy drinks from the bar - the drinks are extremely expensive!!! The hotel is in a great location. It is really close to the main railway station. Plenty of restaurants and cafes close by to take advantage of. Overall the hotel was of a good standard and the negative points didn't spoil anything, they are just points for other travellers to be aware of.

Reviews.Title: “Great afternoon buffet.”
Reviews.Author: pamick
Reviews.Content: My Son and I stayed 3 nights at the Ariston. Every afternoon we spent an hour at the bar because they have a buffet included in the price of the drinks and it is delicious. The pizza is every day fresh and also the cocktails are well done! The hotel is very modern and very clean. The location is perfect for seightseengs.

Reviews.Title: “Great location.”
Reviews.Author: calb78
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent 3 nights at the Àrston in late September/early October. The room was large, had a large bed and was quiet. The breakfast that was included was very good. Close to everything with many restaurants in the area. The staff was very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice room.”
Reviews.Author: buskysteve
Reviews.Content: Three lovely nights at the hotel Ariston. We stayed at other Rome hotels in the past but chose theAriston this time around. It is an intimate hotel and has a very relaxed feeling which we enjoyed. The room was excellent and quite. We found the staff very helpful. The location near the main station is fine. We hope for another visit soon.

Reviews.Title: “A perfect first visit to Rome.”
Reviews.Author: edi56
Reviews.Content: It was our first trip to Rome and the Ariston was absolutely fabulous. The service was incredible with all the staff making you feel welcome. They were more than happy to provide us with some tips and helped us to get some reservations at some amazing restaurants at short notice. The rooms are beautifully clean and the beds are comfortable. The location is very close to everything.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel near termini station”
Reviews.Author: Guddi7780
Reviews.Content: Hotel is located very close to termini station.Rooms very small and overpriced.Breakfast is good.Reception very helpful.No restuarant and didnt like their happy hour buffet ,hardly anything to eat. Overall nice hotel for tourist's.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel, Lovely people, Great Holiday.”
Reviews.Author: Domonique J
Reviews.Content: I was a bit dubious of this hotel after looking at other peoples reviews. I requested a floor above three, non smoking and three beds. I got everything I asked for. I thought the price was perfect for a 4 star hotel but my two friends I went with were expecting a little more. The view wasn't great, we looked out on to a wall and some fire escape stairs but that was fine as they dressed the whole wall with lights and net curtains so that wasnt a problem. The room was air conditioned, immaculately clean, the beds were extremely comfy and the room very quiet. I slept every night like a baby. The hotel is located perfectly for Central Termini which suited us as we got the train to and from Fiumcino airport. (Take the Leanardo Express 14 euros each, each way.) The Trevi fountain and Spanish steps were about a 30 minute walk, the Coliseum about a 15 minute walk and the Vatican City about an hour away. This was fine for us though. We were there for 4 nights and 5 days and we saw and did everything we wanted to do. The Hotel has maps in the lobby which we found very useful. Most nights we would sit in the chill out room which was always empty and quiet. There was the happy hour with free food when a drink was ordered but we didnt do this as there were plenty of lovely cheap reastaurants around us. For a main, dessert and drink I dont think we ever paid more than 15 euros each. Everyone is very friendly and helpful, especially the bar man, (sorry forgot his name) Our room wasn't dated at all. Lovely and modern with a separate shower and toilet to the bath and sink. Red and pruple bathroom but the room itself was white. People do complain about the lift, it was a squeeze sometimes but there were stairs and never waited too long. I will definately be going back to Rome and will definately be staying in this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “We love Rome.”
Reviews.Author: russpaskysti
Reviews.Content: My wife and I spent 4 nights in Rome at the Ariston and it was great. We arrived by train from Venice and the hotel is right there out of the station. The staff at the reception was very helpful and they arranged for us 3 city tours with a local company, really very nice. The room was very clean with enough space lor our luggage. The breakfast is very good and the staff friendly. Rome is unique and I suggest at least to book a city tour in order to have an overview of the city.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money.”
Reviews.Author: isycrow
Reviews.Content: we stayed 3 nights at the Ariston during our vacation in Europe. The hotel has a very good location near the main station and the subway. The style is very modern with many plasma TV in the lobby and at the bar. The room was comfortable and clean facing the court yard. The staff is helpful and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Great breakfast and bar service”
Reviews.Author: spiwizt
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights at the Ariston and we really enjoyed it. The location is ok but the hotel is perfect. The service is very good, the breakfast in the morning is delicious and also the buffet at the bar in the afternoon. Our room was very clean and the size was fine. Hope to be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great rate, good value.”
Reviews.Author: mickylass
Reviews.Content: Stayed 5 nights in this hotel while on a sightseeng trip to Rome. The room rate was extremely convenient and the hotel quality was very good. The bedroom was very spacious and a very comfortable bed which is the most important aspect for any hotel decision. Reception team is very competent and helpful. Convenient location to everything.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in a very central location.”
Reviews.Author: vincig
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a haven ofd calm amongst the chaos in Rome. We stayed for 4 nights at the Ariston. We had an Executive room on the 4th floor, the size was perfect. The king bed was very comfortable, the bathroom size was resonable included a large stand up shower with a great water pressure. At the end of the block is the subway entrance and there are many restaurants in the area. The staff was always friendly and they booked few city tours for us during our stay, very professional.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel to return to after a day's sightseeing”
Reviews.Author: maslinda_mohamad
Reviews.Content: We booked a room in Hotel Ariston directly via their website and had a 20% discount as we stayed more than 3 nights. The promotion also included a complementary one way transfer to or from the airport which was great. We were in contact with the concierge as we needed assistance in making reservations for a restaurant which they happily helped us with. When we arrived, we were told that we were upgraded to the Executive Suite, which made the deal even sweeter. The room was massive, clean, quiet and comfortable. Although the shower cubicle looked a little tatty, it did not affect the overall appearance of the well designed bathroom. There were tea making facilities, which is not common in European hotels, a safe and a fridge. When we were there, the bar was offering a free buffet with ANY drink purchased between 1630-2130h. So for the price of a Diet Coke, we had pasta salads, roasted vegetables, tortillas, cold meats and salads. The hotel is in a great location. very close to the main train station Termini, but it was not in the most desirable neighbourhoods. There is a gym on the 6th floor, which was adequately equipped with cardio machines and fixed weights. Overall, it was a great stay in a great city.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient Location”
Reviews.Author: Patti17011
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Ariston for 4 nights in August. Very convenient to the train station, buses and tour buses. The front desk people could not have been nicer! Great restaurants right across the street.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect access to the downtown in Rome.”
Reviews.Author: slowskyj
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a reasonable hotel that was close to the downtown. This was close enough to the subway that we walked every morning and at the end of the day when my last appointment was near the Roman Forum, it was great to be at only 10 minutes walking distance from thew hotel. Many restaurants nearby. The wifi was perfectly functioning while we were there. The staff was very friendly from the top to bottom and it was a very pleasent stay. We had an interior room that was one of the quitest stay in many years.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, good value for money.”
Reviews.Author: sampritzyw
Reviews.Content: Fast check in, very friendly and smiley staff, the room was small but fine, fresh clean towels, good bathroom, easy walk to the subway. I'd planned a couple of meetings in advance to be held at the hotel thinking there would be some kind of bar service for coffee in a private corner but it was even better so I will probably use the Ariston again fore my daytime meetings.

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel.”
Reviews.Author: johmleff
Reviews.Content: I found this hotel here on Tripadvisor and decided to give it a chance. Very friendly staff and clean everywhere. Nice rooms with cofee facilities and wifi. The hotel was located just across the street from the train station and subway. i didn't hear anything from the traffic. I will definately stay at the Ariston again when visiting Rome again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, would definitely stay again”
Reviews.Author: frankstop74
Reviews.Content: Everything positive at the Ariston in Rome. We booked through booking.com, we had a double room on the third floor and the room was certainly enough for the three of us. Staff were friendly from the manager to the hosekeeping and the breakfast was very good too. The only minor point we would note was the small amount of wardrobe space, ideal for a couple for few days but not enough foe three of us as we were travelling foe 2 weeks. If we were to return to Rome we would have no hesitation in returning to this hotel again or in recommending it to others.

Reviews.Title: “Okay hotel, really depends on luck!”
Reviews.Author: smile4lisa
Reviews.Content: Not a four start hotel. The hotel has was clean, reception was nicely decorated, a small bar area and quite nice breakfast area. A major advantage was the location, very close to the train station and under ground metro. Disadvantages were that you had to be one of the lucky ones to have one of the hotel rooms which look like the ones on their website! Or room was very small, we had about 1 meter space away from each side of the bed. No outside view, so having no natural light ithe room was a it weird. We were also next door to some rooms being refurbished, so it was bit noisy from around 9am onwards, so no lie ins! But we spent most of our time out of the hotel. Bar attender was extremely lovely a d friendly, he took time out to talk to the guests and the hotel bar is guest only. So no outsiders were allowed. Prices of drinks were more expensive than uk, around £6 for a beer, and £10 for a cocktail. But these prices are the same as any other bar in Rome. Overall, the hotel is okay, not worthy of a 4 star, but it met all the basic needs of a place to stay. A word of advise for Rome, but watch out for people dressed in roman outfits, who will charge you silly money for havin your photos taken with them. They take your camera and your loved on and start posing for photos and then they expect you to pay over around €20 for it! Walk away and say no, or pay however much you feel, but't get ripped off!! also, don't out your finger in some string....I will say no more!

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel.”
Reviews.Author: letizmas
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed for 3 nights at the Ariston in Rome and it was very good . The location is fine, not really the best but in the midle of everything. The room was on the 4th floor, very large and comfortable. The staff is friendly and the breakfast buffet very good.

Reviews.Title: “great location and good hotel”
Reviews.Author: sandra186411
Reviews.Content: we chose this hotel for its great location next to Rome Termini . Quiet room, very modern , excellent buffet breakfast. Great for catching the train to civitavecchiato cruise ships.You are halfway up the very long platform when you enter the station near the left luggage. It would have been really helpful if the hotel directions would state take the termini exit near left luggage. Staff very polite easy check in and best of all excellent location.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money.”
Reviews.Author: gracelit45
Reviews.Content: Stayed here last summer on a 4 day solo trip in Rome. It was my 3rd trip to the city but the first on my own. I wanted to stay somewhere central, with modern amenities and a comfy bed. Its located next to the station and is 2 minutes walk to the subway. There are a number of restaurants and bar's close by. The room was big enough for just me with a comfy large bed and a plasma TV, I had clean/modern bathroom with good shower and I got quit nights sleep. Should I return in Rome in the future I will definitely consider booking this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Not a 4* hotel”
Reviews.Author: Oksana A
Reviews.Content: The biggest advantage of the hotel is location. Breakfast was tasty with a big variety. Hotel staff is friendly and helpful. Aircon is fine. The room was not comfortable, specifically the bathroom. It's quite shabby, the door to the toilet does not close up to the end, leaving about 5 cm space. Not quite comfy, isn't it! Moreover, the door to the toilet is made of transparent glass! If I come to Rome again, I will look for another hotel, with a normal, isolated bathroom=)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kittyathome
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in a quiet street only a few hundreds yards from Rome's main station. The staff are friendly, helpful and efficient. I would definitely recommend this reasonably priced hotel to anybody looking for a weekend stay in Rome.

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: bobfrist
Reviews.Content: My job requires me to travel several times a month and I stayed at the Ariston for 3 nights and it was very goods. The rooms are spacious, modern and clean, the location is perfect for business travelers. Very good breakfast .

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and good service”
Reviews.Author: letmasin
Reviews.Content: We booked the Àriston for 3 nights during our vacation in europe. We really enjoyed our stay, the rooms are very clean and they updraded us in a Superior room on the first floor becausse we already stayed in this hotel in 2007. The service is still very good and the breakfast is even better. We wiil be back.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: tonnoris
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay at the Ariston in Rome. The room was extremely clean and spacious, the breakfast is very good and it was included in our rate. We also enjoyed a city tour booked through the reception at the Vatican city.Great stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: morgax
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights at the Ariston after 1 week in the amalfi coast. The hotel has a great location with many restaurants in the area. The room was very clean and the staff is really helpful. Well done.

Reviews.Title: “Good service”
Reviews.Author: vinlau
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights at the Ariston on our way back home after 2 weeks in ìtaly. It was by far the best hotel, we booked 1 Executive room and it was perfect. Very spasious, very clean and with a working WIFI which is very important. The staff is very friendly and the service is really good. We wii be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Good Value”
Reviews.Author: LesleyFlaminio
Reviews.Content: close proximity to Termini Train Station, friendly staff, clean spacious rooms, breakfast was great, the only thing we didn't like was the odour (we put it down to the age of the building)

Reviews.Title: “went out of their way to accommodate our needs”
Reviews.Author: Floridatraveler18
Reviews.Content: What made this hotel so special was the staff. We traveled as 2 couples with special dietary needs and Diana and Zahid went out of their way to make sure those needs were taken care of. We also experienced lost luggage and both Diana and Franco spent much time on the phone with the airline trying to advocate for us to locate and retrieve our bags. Diana also told me which stores to shop in the train station to restock the basics that were in my lost luggage. We really appreciate it .Thank you!!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, very clean”
Reviews.Author: raldol
Reviews.Content: The location of the hotel is perfect, few minutes walking distance from the train station and from the metro. Tho hotel is very clean and the breakfast is very good and with a lot of items. Good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient”
Reviews.Author: gialerro
Reviews.Content: Ì stayed at the Ariston for few days on my way to Florence. The location is good couple of minutes from the metro station whch is few stops away from all the main sites. The room was clean and decorated moden, the bed is particularly comfortable. The people who worked at the front desk were very kind.

Reviews.Title: “Average experience”
Reviews.Author: Evmasson
Reviews.Content: I can see messages praising the staff and the quality of the hotel that do not correspond to my experience at Hotel Ariston. I booked it via lastminute's "secret hotels" (no particular discount, by the way...) after spending several nights in a 2 star hotel close by (hotel malu) which was much much better than Ariston. The receptionist was not friendly at all (even rude when I refused to sign a paper allowing the hotel to charge my credit card, just in case I used the mini bar or stole something, I suppose...), the room was clean but small. The decoration of the hotel looks cheap. on the plus side, its location is good and so is breakfast. However, I would not recommend staying there as other hotels (sometimes much cheaper) offer a much better service.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and staff”
Reviews.Author: letqio
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights at the Ariston after 2 weeks vacation in south Italy.We arrived by train from Naples and the hotel is just aroud the corner next to the station, great location. The staff is really very friendly and helpful. Very nice hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: andrewmar
Reviews.Content: After reading reviews on Tripadvisor we booked for a long weekend the Ariston and everything was true. The hotel has been refurbished recently and the rooms are modern and clean. The staff was very friendly and they booked for us several restaurants. Overall very good.

Reviews.Title: “Very good location, clean and modern”
Reviews.Author: marinlar
Reviews.Content: We stayed 4 nights at the Ariston and we really enjoed it. The location is perfect close to the station and the main attractions. The hotel is very clean and the rooms are very confortable . Many restaurants and shops in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Nice looking room with a few problems”
Reviews.Author: AGaussie
Reviews.Content: We only stayed on night at this hotel and the staff were excellent. The hotel is in a great location and the room looked very nice and clean. However our room smelt terribly of smoke (though it was a non-smoking room!) and the hot water didn't work properly! I little disappointed and I guess we're glad we only had one night there because of those two things.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice room, green and clean.”
Reviews.Author: adriengiacy
Reviews.Content: We booked 2 nights at the Ariston and they have assigned a room on the green floor with a free upgrade which was great. The hotel was very clean and the service was very good. We left to Florence for 2 more nights and went back to Rome for our last night and they assigned again the same room. Very good.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: gitilax
Reviews.Content: We arrived by train from Florence for a long weekend in Rome and the Ariston was perfect for the location next to the train station. From the same station leaves the train to the airport. The hotel is modern with a nice decò, the room was very clean on the executive floor. The staff is very helpful and the bar has nice buffet every afternoon.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel and friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: annemax
Reviews.Content: We spent our first night in Italy al the Ariston and it was a perfect stay. We arrived at the train station and it takes only a minute to rich the hotel. The room has a perfect size and it was modern and confortable. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The breakfast has is very good with a lot of italan specialities. Over all a very nice stay.

Reviews.Title: “We will go back to the Morgana.”
Reviews.Author: cristgae
Reviews.Content: Overall very happy with this place. Room was large and comfortable, bathroom tiny but functional. The breakfass were excellent. Everyone was so nice and helpful. Bar excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Super service.”
Reviews.Author: vincangio
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff is very accomodating and friendly. The rooms are decorated well and are paricularly nice and clean. The hotel is within walking distance of so many shops and restaurants. Great place to stay in Rome.

Reviews.Title: “Great service”
Reviews.Author: lamascri
Reviews.Content: My family of 4 stayed 3 night last June in this hotel and we were pleased with the rooms and the service. The rooms were on the first floor facing the courtyard and they were very spacious. We used the Bar which is very nice with a large buffet every afternoon and the bar tender is friendly and makes very good cocktails. The location is perfect, walking distance from every main attraction.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel, good value for money.”
Reviews.Author: giaktile
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights at the Ariston and it was a pleasent stay. The room was large and very modern with wifi. The breakfast is very various and the staff is very friendly. Good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Failed to impress”
Reviews.Author: Alison0139
Reviews.Content: Good location near the Termini station but the room was small and gloomy with no natural light. Shower had no height adjustment and tray flooded easily. Generally the whole hotel was dated and shabby and certainly did not seem to merit a 4* rating despite the boutique description.

Reviews.Title: “Very modern and nice hotel.”
Reviews.Author: masfla
Reviews.Content: I would really go back to Rome because is unique and I will stay again at the Ariston. The hotel is very modern from the lobby to the rooms and the service is very good. We loved the restaurants in the area and and I suggest the the bar in the hotel with the buffet in the afternoon.

Reviews.Title: “We had a great time would love to go back”
Reviews.Author: wardyBucksEngland
Reviews.Content: My daughters 20 and 14 stayed here for 3 nights. after reading mixed reviews we were pleasantly surprised. Room quite large exec triple with 2 small singles and a larger single sofa bed. No view just walls. Location really good, we felt safe at night even past termini and a few nice pizzerias in adjacent roads. lovely friendly barman kept us topped up with drinks and girls enjoyed the tapas style buffet. Breakfast ample and they will make you lovely cappucinos if you ask. My only complaint was that they were refurbishing rooms on our 2nd floor and one afternoon and in the mornings I couldnt sleep as quite noisy. The staff mostly all seemed very helpful,friendly inc reception,handyman,barman,breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel,very friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: pompeyrog
Reviews.Content: Stayed for two nights ,and had a very nice quite large quiet room on the orange floor.Although we arrived late in the evening the staff were very friendly and helpful.The range of foods for breakfast is good, and the staff were very helpful with sightseeing tips.In the evening there was a free "tapas style"buffet for hotel guests drinking in the bar, and we had a very nice bottle of wine for 18 euros. Would definitely stay again

Reviews.Title: “....but the room is even better!”
Reviews.Author: angiovinci
Reviews.Content: we find the Ariston has a great location and the hotel is really nice but the room is even better. Two qeen size beds, a very clean bathroom, fruit and italian wine for honeymooners in the room and a very good room service for the breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Good base for Rome sightseeing”
Reviews.Author: SydneySarah79
Reviews.Content: Comfortable and quiet room, enjoyable breakfast options, some friendly staff and a convenient base for getting around town.

Reviews.Title: “Modern, affordable and convenient”
Reviews.Author: xdaliv
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a night as a transit, we needed a place near termini after arriving from Venice by train after 5pm and leaving for the airport early in the morning. After reading so many negative responses to staying near termini, my hopes were minimal. All i wanted was a clean place to stay the night after cancelling our booking at another hotel (bad review from our group whom left earlier). Last minute booking was done via booking.com. I wish they had stayed at this hotel as it exceeded my expectation. Reception was helpful, the room was clean and modern. minor cons: A bit cramped and not much space to put our baggages and folded up stroller. No room for a cot or extra bed. Just space to move around. The room tv (flat screen on the wall) was not working, but called reception and soon after that a repair guy came up and adjusted the wiring. considering it was already night time, i was grateful someone came to help and i get to watch live Oscar coverage! no free wifi. There was a window but the view was the service area. ie: no view. away from Rome hotspot making walking back and forth to Spanish Steps/Colloseum far. But termini is near therefore the underground. pro: convenient location. easy to walk to and from termini entrance. theres cheap kebab shops on the way from termini, internet cafe nearby to print stuff (our flight bookings) and surf the internet (cheaper than the hotel rates obviously) and there are restaurants in front of the hotel with friendly owners. love the room simple, clean lines and modern design. Felt safe at night even with a baby (practice your street smart and tough face. im very petite 5'2 and noone bothered me while i wait for hubby by the internet cafe near termini at 9pm). the size of the room is minor as all i wanted was a clean bed to lie down. i got that plus a decent bathroom and 4 plump pillow unrequested! (see photo) ps: based on hotel website photos, there seems to be other room designs available. Ours was the cheapest rate on booking.com Eu 77 for economy room (no breakfast) but it seems we stayed in the executive room instead if based on photo on website? not sure about that.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice stay.”
Reviews.Author: mikifedrx
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights at the Ariston and we really loved the place. The room was very clean and large on the 3rd floor, orange floor. The rest of the hotel is also very nice and the staff is friendly. The hotel is located at only 1 minute from the station.

Reviews.Title: “Great service”
Reviews.Author: giacfabi
Reviews.Content: We stayed 5 nights in Rome at the Ariston for our anniversary and we loved it. The hotel is very clean and beautiful, the staff is just great. The room was also very nice and spacious. Thank you

Reviews.Title: “Very good location.”
Reviews.Author: adrifabi
Reviews.Content: The location of the hotel is really very good. Just in front of the train station and next to the subway which is perfect. We arrived by train from Florence and in 1 minute we were already checked in our room. The accommodation was also very good and the staff very helpful. The bar is very nice expecially the snacks buffet.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for honeymooners!”
Reviews.Author: rosty41
Reviews.Content: we stayed 3 nights at the Ariston during our honeymoon and it was perfect. They have upgraded us in anRxecutive room which was very nice, clean and with a king size bed. The hotel style is very modern with a beautiful bar. The food at the breakfast room was also very good. Thank you

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money.”
Reviews.Author: tosipepre
Reviews.Content: Our weekend at the Ariston was very good. The room was very modern with LCD TV, wifi, two large beds and very clean. The bar buffet is delicious and the staff very friendly. Last but not least the location, very close to the main station. A nice hotel, good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “poor hotel”
Reviews.Author: Th0mas37
Reviews.Content: It does not merit its four stars! small dark room, loud surroundings close to termini, no wifi etc.For this price you can get a beautifull hotel in a nice area

Reviews.Title: “Good location with easy access to all the sights.”
Reviews.Author: Watchman834
Reviews.Content: we stayed at the Ariston for 4 nights in April. The Hotel reception was friendly and efficient and the room was spacious. However, the decor is getting a bit tired and the vivid lime green (walls and floor) of the bathroom was best left behind the closed door. Nonetheless, the beds were comfy, the minibar adequate and a good amount of storage space as well as a safe. The barman was very friendly and each evening there was a free buffet for those using the bar. All in all, a very pleasant stay with very friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and nice.”
Reviews.Author: flavrust
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very good value for money. Rooms are comfortable and clean and the staff is fluently english speaking. We booked a family room from their webpage and had 2 separate large rooms door to door. Great restaurants in the area and the location is very convenient.

Reviews.Title: “elegant and modern”
Reviews.Author: ladyEM84
Reviews.Content: clean, elegant and modern, very comfortable rooms, good value for the price. tasty breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel.”
Reviews.Author: vertes
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 ngihts at the Ariston last weekend. The hotel is very nice, cozy and the locaton is perfect. The room on the 5th floor was very confortable and large. The breakfast buffet is nice and we like to spend time in the morning drinking our coffee, the staff was very friendly. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic room”
Reviews.Author: fabileti
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located next to the metro and the train station and this is perfect in order to visit the entire city. Our room was fantastis, very large with a king size bed, very clean and with a working "WIFI" which is very important. The breakfast is good and also the service.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, good service”
Reviews.Author: icipicc
Reviews.Content: We arrived by train in only 30 minutes from the airport and the hotel is located just outside the station, perfect! The staff is very friendly and the service is good. We stayed 4 nights for a long weekend and this hotel was a good choise. Well done.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice room”
Reviews.Author: luvdezi
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Ariston has been overall good. The room was perfect for 3 of us, clean and spacious. The service is good even if we called the room service the first night and it tooks a litlle bit longer but it was fine . The location was also very good. The bar buffet is really delicious.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: pitz2
Reviews.Content: We have been 2 nights at the Ariston and we are really happy of our experience. The rooms are very trendy, very clean and quite. The breakfast was very good and the staff is very friendly. Last but not least the location which is perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Ask what floor you're room is on 1st”
Reviews.Author: chris917
Reviews.Content: The room was much more spacious than expected and front desk was very helpful. It's close to the termini but not near much else. I'd recommend it to a friend. The only thing to pay attention to is what floor you are on. Each has it's own decor. The one we were on was a combination of austin powers' and a real world pad. Extremely colorful. The glass bathrooms may not be ideal for all guests ;)

Reviews.Title: “Perfect stay”
Reviews.Author: danieldesi
Reviews.Content: We have been in Italy 3 weeks and the Ariston was by far the best hotel. The service is very good and the staff is very friendly, We have booked 2 rooms and they were very spacious and elegant. The bathroom was very clean, this is very important. The location is perfect and there are many restaurants in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Nice pictures - awful truth...”
Reviews.Author: Turisten63
Reviews.Content: From the hotels web-site everything look great - DO NOT belive these pictures! We had 2 exclusive double rooms. As we came in all seemed great, but both the rooms (5th floor) had worn out details absolutly everywhere! The hotel staff at the reseption were unpleasant and seemed not to like or have time for the guests. Breakfast was nice, but NOT worth 15 euro if you have a room without breakfast included.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, nice renovated room”
Reviews.Author: enlightened_0ne
Reviews.Content: This is one of the better hotels in Rome so close to the termini train station. The room I stayed in was well renovated. Bathroom in the area to bathe was however quite stuck. So some water leaked out to the dry area. Otherwise this hotel was good and lived up to my expectations. I expected a single bed but was really happy to see two single beds joined together to make a big double bed! One thing to note is that the bathroom light could not switch off so I had to close the bathroom door when sleeping.

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: robschumann77
Reviews.Content: Great hotel: location is prefect; hotel staff helpful and always smiling; smal but comfortable rooms. I will return for Rugby....

Reviews.Title: “Good choice.”
Reviews.Author: lagae
Reviews.Content: My brother and I stayed 3 nights at the Ariston. We really like it, every afternoon we have been at the Bar not only for the wine which was delicious but expecially for the fabolous snack buffet. The staff is really great and very professiona, next time I'll take my wife with me.l

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel”
Reviews.Author: CCT22
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the hotel for 3 nights knowing that I need to work over the weekend in my hotel room. Reason choosing the hotel is its proximity to the Termini train station as I got in around midnight on Friday and need to catch an early train on Monday morning. Pros: It is close to Termini station (3 minutes walking). The room is clean and the wireless is working eventhough it was sometime very slow (It cost €10 a day and €5 per day afterwards). Cons: I was placed on second floor and renovation is happening on third floor. 8am Saturday morning, all drilling and banging started. Complaint to the front desk and been told that they will stop at midday, however the actual time the work stop was 2pm. If I have known, I will go out then come back to work in the hotel in the afternoon. Monday morning, constant banging started at 5am, not too sure where the noise came from. It was annoying however it only impacted me for an hour as I planned to get up at 6am. Room assigned is an old room, besides the TV, all things were dated. I booked the hotel via agoda website and would appreciate if it tells its customers that the hotel is currently going through renovation. If I knew, would not book myself there as I know I need to work some part of the weekend. Further, in my opinion this is more ike a 3 star rather than a 4 start hotel given the room I was in. The pictures shown on agoda are those renovated rooms. Not sure how many of those available.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, good value for money.”
Reviews.Author: loujerry
Reviews.Content: We have just left the hotel after 3 days in Rome. The service is just perfect and the hotel is very nice. Great location.

Reviews.Title: “We recommend it!”
Reviews.Author: angiomi
Reviews.Content: We highly recommend the hotel Ariston for its location and for the professional service they provide. A nice 4 stars hotel indeed! Loved the room and the breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Great place.”
Reviews.Author: cristima
Reviews.Content: We have been 2 weeks in Italy and 3 nights at the Ariston and this was the best hotel of our trip. It is next to the station and the location is very convenient. The room was really spacious and very clean. Great place.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing”
Reviews.Author: marckringlers
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed four nights in Rome. The room was very spacious and comfortable. The breakfast was excellent with a very nice buffet ad good service. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel”
Reviews.Author: lety02
Reviews.Content: we stayed 3 nights at the Ariston and it was really pleasent. The hotel is very nice and the staff very helpful. There is a good choise of restaurants in the area

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: Adryla
Reviews.Content: The location of the hotel is perfect, very good for public transportation and for sightseeng. The hotel is very nice and elegant, I racccomand the Bar, they have a delicious snack buffet in the aternoon.Good choice

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money.”
Reviews.Author: jerryloo
Reviews.Content: We have been 3 days in Rome and the hotel was just fantastic. The breakfast is very good, I suggest the 'frittata' is delicious. The rooom is very clean and the staff very helpful. Good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, fantastic breakfast”
Reviews.Author: letigiacg
Reviews.Content: The hotel Ariston has a great location, rooms are very large and clean. The breakfast is really good. Good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “just great!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: icinet
Reviews.Content: We had really a great experience at the Hotel Ariston. The room was very clean and spacious. The staff has been very helpfull, expecially Franco and the breakfast was really fantastic. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “thank you ariston”
Reviews.Author: tamaraPilipinas
Reviews.Content: we stayed here for 4 days, and unlike other we really enjoyed our stay. Excellent service, and very friendly staffs. My bf was just disappointed with the size of the room ,but all over we really had a nice time in this hotel. Theres a very nice trattoria at the back of the hotel which is very nice, i cant remember the name but ask the reception and they will surely indicate it to you. Grazie mille once again ariston see you next year

Reviews.Title: “Great Weekend at Hotel Ariston in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Ella555
Reviews.Content: I travelled to Rome for a weekend and had a great stay at the Hotel Ariston. The room were very clean and comfortable. All the staff, especially at reception, were very kind - welcoming and always there to answer my queries. I also enjoyed the really nice breakfast before a day in Rome. I would certainly come back to this hotel when in Rome and recommend it to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Beware if you book from a discount site”
Reviews.Author: Bananaboat711
Reviews.Content: This hotel was so disappointing. I stayed in August of 2009. We got our hotel from wotif.com and it wasn't cheap. Definitely NOT a 4* hotel. I asked to be moved and they showed me rooms from the same floor which had the same old type of sheets as my current room. Conditions were closer to a 2* hotel that was on the verge of a 1*. When I asked for a different room they were hesitant to show me anymore because they said I should have told them earlier, SO check out the room first and make sure its habitable! I asked if there were any other rooms that looked better and they said No, so I laid off the front desk lady thinking that the whole hotel was like this. But I was still annoyed so I struck up a conversation with a guest in the elevator and asked him how his room was and he said it was okay and when the elevators opened it was like NIGHT AND DAY!.. His floor looked renovated and the carpet didn't look disgusting..argh! I'm a person that has to feel a room is clean before I can sleep well and if you're the same choose a different hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Not even close to a 4-star hotel”
Reviews.Author: JKBrecht
Reviews.Content: I stayed in an economy room at this hotel since it is just one street over from the Termini Station and I had a short overnight layover before catching a connecting flight. There is a direct train (Leonardo Express) from the Rome Ariport to Termini. The location of Hotel Ariston is really convenient for both for its proximity to Termini Station as well as to the historical city center. However, this hotel is not even close to the 4-star rating that it advertises and the contrast between the condition of the actual room I stayed in and the pictures gracing the hotel website are nothing short of fraud. My room had jsut enough space to walk between the bed and closet and between the desk and mini-refrigerator, compared to the website picture of a room with space to walk around three sides of the bed and with another table and a bedside table that did not exist in my room. The furnishings in my room were were old and shabby - nothing at all like the beautiful room with full length curtains and art on the wall that is pictured on the hotel website.

Reviews.Title: “NICE HOTEL , BUT THE BAR WAS AWFUL”
Reviews.Author: rachelmitchell
Reviews.Content: The hotel was really nice i cant complain like some other reviews , environment was great in some points , the receptionist was very friendly, breakfast people were very nice, but i do have a little complain about the bar ....there was this girl who obviously works in the bar area with blond long hair and you could tell she is not Italian ,i feel like her clothing is not appropriate and is not professional , because is a 4 STAR hotel , I really feel like she goes to flirt with customers because i caught her doing that with my husband ,that would be the only reason why i wouldn't go back to the hotel , I THINK THERE'S SO MANY PEOPLE WHO THEY BRING THEIR FAMILIES AND HUSBANDS AND IM PRETTY SURE THEY DON'T WANT TO SEE THAT , AFTER ALL THAT I HAD A GREAT TIME AT THIS HOTEL

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, good vibe”
Reviews.Author: lasppt
Reviews.Content: The rooms are in a contemporary style, good bed, good amenities. It served perfectly the purpose to be a base to explore London. Good breakfast, we did enjoy our stay!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is never 4 Star”
Reviews.Author: Habsfan80
Reviews.Content: First of all I have to mention that we booked the Hotel Morgana which is just opposite of Ariston. We arrived just before midnight and the guy at the reception told us that they have no rooms available due to overbooking. We couldn't believe this could happen, however he made a call and we were transfered to Ariston. So this Hotels work together in case of overbooking. We were promised to get an upgrade in Ariston because of their mistake. Anyway, the staff in Ariston welcomed us friendly and confirmed we will get a suite. When we arrived to that "suite", we realised that this is just a normal room. The room was recently refurbished and a bit smelly, thought it was color. The room is very small and the locker didn't work. The shower door didn't close properly so the whole bathroom was wet after having a shower. I didn't find any good words for this hotel... WIFI is 10 Euro for 24 hours but not worth as connection is bad and also the breakfast buffet is below average. The scrambled eggs were the worst in my life and also they didn't refill orange juice when it was empty. Unacceptable service. The only good thing about this hotel is the location, just one block away from Termini Station. I'm really wondering how this Hotel was rated 4 star.

Reviews.Title: “Great Friendly Hotel”
Reviews.Author: glasg0wsandra
Reviews.Content: after an initial hiccup where only one room was booked for us instead of 3 ,the staff went out their way to make our stay very enjoyable. We were upgraded to larger rooms and wine was supplied. The rooms were modern and clean, breakfast was included and a bar buffet was laid on for guests who bought drinks at bar. The bar staff "Chandon" was delightful and the reception staff Daniel and Ruby were so helpful. Location was great for transport next to Train station. I would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The most horrible hotel I have ever stayed at!”
Reviews.Author: Kamyczek27
Reviews.Content: I have spent the most terrible and stressful 2 nights in my life at the end of my holidays in Italy. We have booked a modern double room. The room we got was NOTHING like the one on the hotel webiste! the room was tiny and we hardly fit in it. The suitcases had to stay outside of the room! When we looked at the fire emergency chart the room was marked as a single room, They simply put a double bed into a single room. There was no space to go around the bed. The hotel claims to have 4 stars... After the complain we were offered another room... Where should I start a description of that one? Bathrrom covered with mold, dark stains on an old, red carpet, table made of a thick card board and very, very, very tired furniture! To top the experience up the most rude staff I have ever met during my numerous travells. I would not recommend this hotel to absolutely anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Not a 4 star hotel. DO NOT BOOK”
Reviews.Author: Blixa
Reviews.Content: The hotel is frankly appalling - barely 2 star (meaning tolerable). It’ s a con. First, the hotel is located near Roma Termini (the train station) which is a dodgy neighbourhood and not safe at night for tourists. Second the rooms are awful – either ‘Easy jet contemporary’ or just old, tired and tatty. Lastly, I’m not sure but I think the room gave us was a FIRE HAZARD (9m2 single on the fire plan but had a double bed). The exposed wires in the bathroom are definitely a FIRE HAZARD. The management is the worst. When we complained, we were verbally assaulted (curiously, the manager insulted my family for some reason). It was surreal. There are better hotels for these prices in Rome. And there are cheaper hotels in this neighbourhood of the same quality.

Reviews.Title: “do not book this hotel - you never know what you will get”
Reviews.Author: donswan
Reviews.Content: After we gave the receptionist our passports and were checked-in she told us that they do not have available rooms for the moment and escorted us to hotel Morgana (which is on the opposite site of the street). Isn't it strange!!! But it seems that it is a standard practice in Ariston to send their guests to Morgana!! This was very, very dissapointing. Besides Morgana is an awful place to stay. They spoiled our last night in Rome! Do not recommend either Ariston or Morgana....

Reviews.Title: “Lovely place, great for families”
Reviews.Author: sara1105
Reviews.Content: What an incredible hotel. This hotel is found right close to the main train, bus and metro station, therefore the way to move around the city was easier than ever. No taxis needed. We booked a family room consisting of two deluxe rooms connecting each other. This was perfectly suiting the six of us. The staff was very friendly and helpful, giving us extra information about the city, good restaurants (recommendations) and directions to the main city attractions. We had a complimentary pick up from the airpot with a big minivan, was an great benefit. The staff was lovely, good rooms, great location and breakfast. We will sure come back again to Hotel Ariston when in Rome.

Reviews.Title: “Solid 2 Star”
Reviews.Author: meonearth
Reviews.Content: To me, this was exactly what you would expect from a 2 Star hotel - just plain tolerable. The best thing about the hotel is that it has rooms that can sleep two adults and two children, (very hard to find in Rome). The room was reasonably clean and although the bathroom was in a strange configuration, it ultimately worked ok for us. Breakfast buffet was absolutely horrible, though. I was actually shocked at the incredible low quality of the food. I have traveled all over the world and I have never seen such bland, cheap food. The eggs were so weird that after a lot of discussion, we determined that they must have been made from a powder. Just picture food so cheap that you can't even imagine what stores would carry it.... I would say if you need a budget hotel, this is a reasonable choice but just look at the photos so that you know what to expect. AND DON'T BUY THE BREAKFAST!

Reviews.Title: “Not nice”
Reviews.Author: AbhishekG_Mumbai
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately I can not say any good thing about this Hotel. Staff rude and utterly devoid of kindness. It seemed that they were doing me a favor. Complete lack of confidence in the client: they demanded the money at the time of my arrival at the hotel and departure. In addition I had 100 euros from my credit card held back for 35 days despite having paid in cash. The room was more like a cell than a hotel room and certainly not 4 star. Room very small, hard bed, pillow too heavy and rigid. Hygiene was not even from 4 star hotel. reservation was very difficult - I had to send email after email to verify my identity, even required to send a fax! Found a dirty bag left in the refrigerator and a bottle of open water with half of its contents and a used bottle of wine

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: biomom_05
Reviews.Content: It was 2nd worst, only to a Russian hotel in the 80's with bed bugs. The pictures on the website should be fraud! The rooms are old and small. The shower is tiny. Water leaks everywhere and it's a 50/50 chance of having hot water. No shampoo. Internet access is poor and bandwidth low. The only positive things I can say is the beds were comfortable and it has good access to public transportation.

Reviews.Title: “Very Convenient”
Reviews.Author: MikeOli
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very convenient to the Termini station (one block away). The Termini station is where you go for all your transportation needs in Rome, including Hop on Hop off tours. Although the area at night around the Termini can be a little seedy, we walked to and from with no problems. The hotel staff was friendly, and always were willing to help as much as they could. We arrived early, they held our luggage in a room next to the front desk and brought it up to the room while we started sight-seeing. The breakfast was good and the small wait staff would get us a cafe or cappuccino upon asking. The room was a basic room with all the amenities we needed. It wasn't a fancy room, but we found that they spend too much time trying to make a basic room into a fancy room; just keep it stupid, simple and clean. Now the bad "It was the bathroom". We noticed that the ceiling was made out of metal; high humidity and metal don't mix well. Of course there was some notable rust that had been painted over, but it was starting to show again. Also the shower drain had rust on it. When we first got the room it was very clean, but as the days went on we noticed the bathroom wasn't as clean as when we first got it (maybe they changed maids as the week went on and the second maid didn't work as hard). The A/C worked well in the day, but if your there to sight-see in day you need it at night. I still don't know why Europe won't allow it's citizens make the decision when to turn the A/C or heat on? It was cool at night, but you couldn't open the window at night with all the noise outside on the street. If you just need a clean room, not too expensive, with access to the Termini station this is a good hotel to stay in. One other convenient thing about this hotel is; the restaurant across the street would open till about 11:30 p.m. The night we got back from Pompeii, we were able to get something to eat there. The food was OK the waiters..., well what can say...

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel in a central location but poor value for money”
Reviews.Author: Ange_from_cheshire
Reviews.Content: Booked this hotel on a deal for 3 nights for a short break in Rome. Location is a few mins walk from Termini station so it is central but the area is a little 'dodgy' especially at night (reminded me a bit of the areas around Kings Cross in London!). Hotel had a nice, modern foyer but our room on the 2nd floor was basic and very small. Even tinier bathroom (eg. had to put your legs under the sink in order to use the toilet!). Room was clean and had a comfy bed, TV and fridge. Airconditioning was provided but didn't seem to work. It was a quiet room so we got a good night's sleep. A basic buffet breakfast in the foyer (no restaurant) is available at an extra charge of 15 euros per person - this is not good value at all and round the corner you can get a nice coffee and croissant for 1.50 euros! Not sure all this equates to a 4 star hotel. For the money, it was average value but am sure there must be better quality hotels around for a similar price.

Reviews.Title: “Rude staff, very noisy, transit location only”
Reviews.Author: zed64
Reviews.Content: Do not go to this hotel if you are on holiday to visit Rome. The only good thing is that it is across the road from the train station, but not across the best road. staff are rude, the only words i got from them are "passport please" (not sure about the 'please') and in the morning "room number" just to check if i was not sneaking out. rooms were very noisy, and i had to open the window because they had (apprenetly) centralized air con and it was obviously not working/properly set up. i even called them to inform, they shout at me that it was working ! not even come to check, not even call back to verify it was better now (and it was not!) not even apologize or offer another room. the room itself is a nice design, nice lobby, but it does not compensate the overall experience. very bad!

Reviews.Title: “THE WORST SERVICE IN THE WORLD!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: WVB
